anya-e1101n:1007_0: Jambudīpe aññatarasmiṃ janapade kire ko manusso raṭṭhato raṭṭhaṃ janapadato janapadaṃ
anya-e1101n:1007_1: vicaranto anukkamena candabhāgānadītīraṃ patvā nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā paratīraṃ gacchati.
anya-e1101n:1007_2: Athāparā gabbhinitthī tāya eva nāvāya gacchati, atha nāvā gaṅgāmajjhappattakāle tassā
anya-e1101n:1007_3: kammajavātā caliṃsu. Tato sā vijāyitumasakkontī kilantā pānīyaṃ me detha, pipāsitāmhiti
anya-e1101n:1007_4: manusse yāci. Te tassā vacanaṃ asuṇantā viya pānīyaṃ nādaṃsu, atha so jānapadiko
anya-e1101n:1007_5: tassā karuṇāyanto karuṇāyapānīyaṃ, karuṇāyantopānīyaṃ, karuṇāyatoyaṃ iticakatthaci
anya-e1101n:1007_6: toyaṃ gahetvā mukhe āsiñci, tasmiṃ khaṇe sā laddhassāsā sukhena dārakaṃ vijāyi, atha
anya-e1101n:1007_7: te tīraṃ patvā katipayadivasena attano attano ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Athāparabhāge so
anya-e1101n:1007_8: jānapadiko aññatarakiccaṃ paṭicca tassā itthiyā vasananagaraṃ patvā tattha tattha
anya-e1101n:1007_9: āhiṇḍanto nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhitvā nagaradvāre sālaṃ gantvā tattha nipajji. Tasmiṃyeva
anya-e1101n:1007_10: divase corā nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājagehe sandhiṃ chinditvā dhanasāraṃ gahetvā gacchantā
anya-e1101n:1007_11: rājapurisehi anubandhā gantvā tāyeva sālāya chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Atha rājapurisā
anya-e1101n:1007_12: āgantvā core apassantā taṃ jānapadikaṃ disvā ayaṃ coroti gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhaṃ
anya-e1101n:1007_13: bandhitvā puna divase rañño dassesuṃ. Raññā kasmā bhaṇe corakamma makāsīti pucchito
anya-e1101n:1007_14: nāhaṃ deva coro, āgantukomhīti vutte rājā core pariyesitvā alabhanto ayameva coro,
anya-e1101n:1007_15: imaṃ mārethāti āṇāpesi. Rājapurisehi taṃ gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā āghātanaṃ nīte sā itthī
anya-e1101n:1007_16: taṃ tathā nīyamānaṃ disvā sañjānitvā kampamānahadayā muhuttena rañño santikaṃ gantvā
anya-e1101n:1007_17: vanditvā deva eso na coro āgantuko muñcathetaṃ devāti āha. Rājā tassā kathaṃ asaddahanto
anya-e1101n:1007_18: yajjetaṃ mocetu micchasi. Tassagghanakaṃ dhanaṃ datvā muñcāpehīti, sā sāmi mama gehe
anya-e1101n:1007_19: dhanaṃ natthi. Apica mama sattaputtehi saddhiṃ maṃ dāsiṃ karohi, etaṃ muñca devāti
anya-e1101n:1007_20: āha, atha rājā tvaṃ etaṃ adhunāgatoti vadasi. Etaṃ nissāya puttehi saddhiṃ attānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1007_21: dāsattaṃ sāvesi. Kimeso te ñāti vā, udāhu upakārakoti pucchanto āha.

anya-e1101n:1047_0: Bhagavati parinibbute sāvatthiyaṃ somabrāhmaṇo somadattabrāhmaṇoti dve brāhmaṇā vasanti.
anya-e1101n:1047_1: Tattha somadattabrāhmaṇena saddhiṃ somabrāhmaṇo yebhuyyena dūtaṃ kīḷati. Athekadivasaṃ
anya-e1101n:1047_2: somadatto somabrāhmaṇaṃ tena parājetvā tassa uttarāsaṅgañca lañchanamuddikañca gahetvā
anya-e1101n:1047_3: attano gehaṃ gacchanto somabrāhmaṇassa ehi gehaṃ gacchā- māti āha. Tato somo nāhaṃ
anya-e1101n:1047_4: samma ekasāṭako hutvā antaravīthiṃ otarituṃ sakkomi. Gamanato ettheva me ṭhānaṃ varataranti
anya-e1101n:1047_5: āha, somadattena evaṃ sati samma imaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ gaṇhāti tassa taṃ datvā idāni
anya-e1101n:1047_6: samma ehīti vuttopi nāgacchati. Puna tena bho kasmā nāgacchasīti puṭṭho samma mama
anya-e1101n:1047_7: hatthe muddikaṃ apassantā me puttadārādayo mayā saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karontīti āha, atha
anya-e1101n:1047_8: so evaṃ sante yadā te pahoti. Tadā mayhaṃ dehīti muddikampi datvā taṃ gahetvā gehaṃ
anya-e1101n:1047_9: agamāsi. Atha te ettakena sahāyā ahesuṃ. Aparabhāge somadattabrāhmaṇaṃ ayaṃ paradārakammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1047_10: akāsīti manussā gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā rājāṇaṃ akatvā
anya-e1101n:1047_11: mā bho puna evamakāsīti ovaditvā vissajjesi. Rājā naṃ yāvatatiyavāraṃ ovadanto vissajjetvā
anya-e1101n:1047_12: catutthevāre gacchathetaṃ āghātanaṃ netvā mārethāti āṇāpesi. Evaṃ pāpakamme niratā
anya-e1101n:1047_13: anekākārena ovadantāpi na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tathāhi.

anya-e1101n:1054_0: Tato rājapurisā taṃ bandhitvā pakkamiṃsu. Tadā somabrāhmaṇo somadattaṃ tathā nīyamānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1054_1: disvā kampamānahadayo rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā imaṃ bho muhuttaṃ mā māretha.
anya-e1101n:1054_2: Yāva rājānaṃ jānāpessāmīti vatvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ṭhito deva mama jīvitaṃ
anya-e1101n:1054_3: somadattassa brāhmaṇassa dassāmi. Etaṃ muñcatha. Yadi māretukāmā, maṃ mārethāti āha.
anya-e1101n:1054_4: Rājā tuṇhī tuṭṭho itikatthaci ahosi, rājapurisā somadattaṃ muñcitvā somabrāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e1101n:1054_5: āghātanaṃ netvā māresuṃ, aho kataññuno kataveditā.
anya-e1101n:1059_0: So tena jīvitadānena devaloke nibbattitvā mahante kanakavimāne devaccharāsahassaparivuto
anya-e1101n:1059_1: dibbasampattimanubhonto paṭivasati. Tadā somadattabrāhmaṇo eso maṃ maraṇappattaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_2: mocesīti vatvā tassatthāya dānaṃ datvā pattiṃ adāsi. Tāvadevassa tato bahutaraṃ devissariyaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_3: ahosi devānubhāvañca. Tato so somadevo attano devissariyaṃ olokento sahāyassa attano
anya-e1101n:1059_4: jīvitadānaṃ addasa. Disvā attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇena somadattabrāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_5: upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā attānaṃ devaloke nibbattabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā taṃ gahetvā
anya-e1101n:1059_6: attano ānubhāvena devalokaṃ netvā yathākāmaṃ sampatti manubhavāti vatvā sattāhaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_7: devassariyaṃ datvā sattame divase netvā tassa geheyeva patiṭṭhāpesi. Tattha hi dibbasampatti
anya-e1101n:1059_8: manubhūtassa manussasampatti paṭikkulā hoti. Tato so dibbasampattimanussaranto kiso
anya-e1101n:1059_9: dubbalo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ devaputto taṃ olokento tathā dukkhappattaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_10: disvā na sakkā manussena dibbasampattimanubhavitunti icchiticchitasampattidāyakaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_11: ekaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ datvā tassa bhariyampi attano ānubhāvena rūpavanthaṃ yasavantaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ
anya-e1101n:1059_12: atikkantamanussitthivaṇṇaṃ akāsi, aparabhāge te jayampatikā paccakkhato diṭṭhadibbasampattivibhavā
anya-e1101n:1059_13: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā sahāyadevaputtassa santikeyeva nibbattiṃsūti.
anya-e1101n:1069_0: Bhagavati parinibbutamhi kosalarañño kira janapade tuṇḍagāmonāma ahosi. Tattheko
anya-e1101n:1069_1: buddhadāso nāma manusso “yāvajīvaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi. Buddho me saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ
anya-e1101n:1069_2: leṇaṃ parāyaṇanti” evaṃ jīvitapariyantaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato paṭivasati, tasmiṃ
anya-e1101n:1069_3: samaye eko janapadavāsiko tattha tattha āhiṇḍanto taṃ tuṇḍagāmaṃ patvā tasseva ghare
anya-e1101n:1069_4: nivāsaṃ kappesi, tassa pana jānapadikassa sarīre eko yakkho āvisitvā pīḷeti, tadā
anya-e1101n:1069_5: tassa gāmassa pavisanakāle yakkho buddhadāso pāsakassa guṇatejena tassa gehaṃ pavisituṃ
anya-e1101n:1069_6: asakkonto taṃ muñcitvā bahigāme sattāhaṃ aṭṭhāsi tassāgamanaṃ olokento. Tato so jānapadiko
anya-e1101n:1069_7: sattadivasaṃ tattha vasitvā sattame divase sakaraṭṭhaṃ gantukāmo gāmā nikkhami. Atha
anya-e1101n:1069_8: taṃ tathā nikkhantaṃ disvā yakkho aggahesi, atha so taṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kuhiṃgatosīti
anya-e1101n:1069_9: pucchi. Yakkho bho tavatthāya ettha vasantassa me sattāhaṃ atikkantanti. Tato so
anya-e1101n:1069_10: ko te mayā attho, kiṃ te dammīti, atha yakkhena bho ahaṃ khudāya pīḷito bhattena
anya-e1101n:1069_11: me atthoti vutto so evaṃ sati kasmā maṃ antogehe vasantaṃ na gaṇhīti āha. Yakkhena
anya-e1101n:1069_12: bho tasmiṃ ghare buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato eko upasako atthi, tassa sīlatejena gehaṃ pavisitumasakkonto
anya-e1101n:1069_13: aṭṭhāsinti vutto jānapadiko saraṇaṃ nāma kinti ajānanto kinti vatvā so saraṇaṃ aggahesīti
anya-e1101n:1069_14: yakkhaṃ pucchi. Yakkho “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vatvā saraṇaṃ aggahesīti āha.
anya-e1101n:1069_15: Taṃ sutvā jānapadiko idāni imaṃ vañcessāmīti cintetvā tenahi yakkha ahampi buddhaṃ
anya-e1101n:1069_16: saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti āha. Evaṃ vuttamatteyeva yakkho mahāsaddaṃ karonto bha ye na bhamanto
anya-e1101n:1069_17: palāyi, evaṃ sammāsambuddhassa saraṇaṃ idhaloke bhayo paddava nivāraṇatthaṃ hoti,
anya-e1101n:1087_0: Tato jānapadiko saraṇāgamane mahāguṇaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ oloketvā buddhe sagāravo sappemo
anya-e1101n:1087_1: “jīvitapariyantaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti saraṇaṃ gantvā teneva saraṇāgamanānubhāvena
anya-e1101n:1095_0: Bhagavati dharamāne rājagahanagare kira eko brahmabhattiko micchādiṭṭhiko paṭivasati,
anya-e1101n:1095_1: tattheva sammādiṭṭhikopi. Tesaṃ ubhinnampi dve puttā ahesuṃ. Te ekato kīḷantā vaḍḍhanti.
anya-e1101n:1095_2: Athāparabhāge guḷakīḷaṃkīḷantānaṃ sammādiṭṭhikassa putto “namo buddhayā”ti vatvā
anya-e1101n:1095_3: guḷhaṃ khipanto divase divase jināti. Micchādiṭṭhikassa putto “namo brahmuno”ti vatvā
anya-e1101n:1095_4: khipanto parājeti, tato micchādiṭṭhikassa putto niccaṃ jinantaṃ sammādiṭṭhikaṃ kumāraṃ
anya-e1101n:1095_5: disvā samma tvaṃ niccameva jināsi, kiṃ vatvā guḷaṃ khipasīti pucchi. Sohaṃ samma
anya-e1101n:1095_6: “namo buddhāyā”ti vatvā khipāmīti āha. Sopi tato paṭṭhāya “namo buddhāyā”ti vatvā
anya-e1101n:1095_7: khipati, atha te yebhuyyena dūte samasamāva honti. Aparabhāge micchādiṭṭhikassa putto
anya-e1101n:1095_8: pitarā saddhiṃ dārūnamatthāya vanaṃ gantvā sakaṭena dāruṃ gahetvā āgacchanto nagaradvārasamīpe
anya-e1101n:1095_9: sakaṭaṃ vissajjetvā tiṇe khādanatthāya goṇe vissajjesi, goṇā tiṇaṃ khādanto aññehi
anya-e1101n:1095_10: gorūpehi saddhiṃ antonagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. Athassa pitā goṇe pariyesanto sakaṭaṃ olokehīti
anya-e1101n:1095_11: puttaṃ nivattetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭho ahosi, atha sāyaṇhe jāte manussā nagaradvāraṃ
anya-e1101n:1095_12: pidahiṃsu, tato kumāro bahinagare dārusakaṭassa heṭṭhā sayanto niddūpagato ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1095_13: Atha tassā rattiyā sammādiṭṭhiko ca micchādiṭṭhiko cāti dve yakkhā gocaraṃ pariyesamānā
anya-e1101n:1095_14: sakaṭassa heṭṭhā nipannaṃ kumāraṃ addasaṃsu, tesu micchādiṭṭhiko imaṃ khādāmīti āha.
anya-e1101n:1095_15: Athāparo mā eva makāsi, “namo buddhāyā”ti vācako esoti, khādāmevetanti vatvā itarena
anya-e1101n:1095_16: yāvatatiyaṃ vāriyamānopi gantvā tassa pāde gahetvā ākaḍḍhi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe dārako pubbaparicayena
anya-e1101n:1095_17: “namo buddhāyā”ti āha taṃ sutvā yakkho bhayappatto lomahaṭṭho hatthaṃ vissajjetvā
anya-e1101n:1095_18: paṭikkamma aṭṭhāsi. Aho acchariyaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ abbhutaṃ, evaṃ attaṃ anīyyātetvā
anya-e1101n:1095_19: paricayena “namo buddhāyā”ti vuttassapi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ upaddavaṃ vā na hoti.
anya-e1101n:1095_20: Pageva attaṃ nīyyātetvā yāvajīvaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatassāti. Vuttañhi.
anya-e1101n:1100: Yathā mantassa jappena, vilayaṃ yāti kibbisaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1101: Evaṃ buddhoti vacanena, apayanti pahāyanti itisabbattha pisācakā.
anya-e1101n:1103: Aggiṃ disvā yathā sitthaṃ, dūratova vilīyati;
anya-e1101n:1104: Disvānevaṃ saraṇagataṃ, petā pentiva petāpentāva itikatthaci dūrato.
anya-e1101n:1110: Tameva nāvaṃ dīpaṃ taṃ, tameva kavacaṃ subhaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1129: Namoti vacanaṃ pubbaṃ, buddhāyeti giraṃ tadā;
anya-e1101n:1132: Sutvā vuttaṃ pisā cāpi, manussakuṇape ratā;
anya-e1101n:1134_0: Atha sammādiṭṭhikayakkho micchādiṭṭhikassa yakkhassa evamāha, ayuttaṃ bho tayā kataṃ.
anya-e1101n:1134_1: Buddhaguṇe pahāro dinno, daṇḍakammaṃ tayā kātabbaṃti, tena kiṃmayā samma kātabbanti
anya-e1101n:1134_2: vutte bubhukkhitassa āhāraṃ dehīti āha. Tato so sādhūti vatvā yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi,
anya-e1101n:1134_3: tvaṃ tāvettha vacchāhīti vatvā bimbisārarañño kañcanataṭṭake vaḍḍhitaṃ rasabhojanaṃ
anya-e1101n:1134_4: āharitvā kumārassa pituvaṇṇena dārakaṃ bhojetvā puna kumārena vuttabuddhavacanañca
anya-e1101n:1134_5: attanā katavāyāmaṃ cāti sabbaṃ taṭṭake likhitvā idaṃ raññoyeva paññāyatūti adhiṭṭhāya
anya-e1101n:1134_6: agamaṃsu, atha pabhātāya rattiyā rañño bhojanakāle rājapurisā tattha taṭṭakaṃ adisvā
anya-e1101n:1134_7: nagaraṃ upaparikkhantā sakaṭe dārakañca taṭṭakañca disvā taṭṭakena saddhiṃ taṃ gahetvā
anya-e1101n:1134_8: rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā taṭṭake akkharādīni disvā vācetvā tassa guṇe pasanno mahantena
anya-e1101n:1142_0: Jambudīpe mahābodhito kira dakkhiṇapasse etaṃ paccantanagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha saddhāsampanno
anya-e1101n:1142_1: ratanattayamāmako eko upāsako paṭivasati. Tadā eko khīṇāsavo bhagavatā paribhuttaṃ
anya-e1101n:1142_2: pādapīṭhaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā gatagataṭṭhāne pūjento anukkamena taṃ nagaraṃ sampāpuṇitvā
anya-e1101n:1142_3: sunivattho supāruto pattaṃ gahetvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajji yugamattadaso pabbajjālīlāya
anya-e1101n:1142_4: janaṃ paritosento. Atha so upāsako tathā gacchantaṃ theraṃ disvā pasannamānaso upagantvā
anya-e1101n:1142_5: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā bhojetvā nibaddhaṃ mama gehaṃ āgamanamicchāmi,
anya-e1101n:1142_6: mamānukampāya ettheva vasatha sāmīti yācitvā nagarāsanne ramaṇīye vanasaṇḍe nadīkūle
anya-e1101n:1142_7: paṇṇasālaṃ katvā therassa taṃ nīyyātetvā catupaccayehi paṭijagganto mānento pūjento
anya-e1101n:1142_8: vasati. Theropi tattha phāsukaṭṭhāne bhagavatā paribhuttapādapīṭhadhātuṃ nidhāya
anya-e1101n:1142_9: vālukāhi thūpaṃ katvā niccaṃ gandhadhūpadīpapupphapūjādīhi pūjayamāno vāsaṃ kappeti.
anya-e1101n:1142_10: Tasmiṃ samaye tasso pāsakassa anantaragehavāsiko eko issarabhattiko attano devataṃ
anya-e1101n:1142_11: nibaddhaṃ namassati. Taṃ disvāssa upāsako buddhaguṇe vatvā akhette samma mā viriyaṃ
anya-e1101n:1142_12: karohi. Pajahetaṃ diṭṭhiṃti āha. Tato so kerāṭiko issarabhattiko ko te satthu guṇānubhāvo,
anya-e1101n:1142_13: amhākaṃ issarassa guṇova mahantoti vatvā tassa aguṇaṃ guṇanti kathento āha.
anya-e1101n:1156: Ratiyā ca madhupāne ca, byāvaṭo sabbadā ca so;
anya-e1101n:1159: Na jāto na bhayaṃ tassa, maraṇaṃ natthi sassato;
anya-e1101n:1161: Taṃ sutvā upāsako samma tuyhaṃ issarassa ete guṇā nāma tāva hontu. Aguṇā nāma kittakā hontīti vatvā bhagavato sakalaguṇe saṃharitvā kathento āha.
anya-e1101n:1169: Evaṃ santo viyattoca viyanto itikatthaci, evaṃ so karuṇāparo;
anya-e1101n:1170: Eva middhividhā tassa, evamevaṃ guṇā iti.
anya-e1101n:1176_0: Evaṃ vadantā pana te ubhopi amhākaṃ devo uttamo amhākaṃ devo uttamoti kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e1101n:1176_1: rañño santikamagamaṃsu, rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tenahi tumhākaṃ devatānaṃ mahantabhāvaṃ
anya-e1101n:1176_2: iddhipāṭihāriyena jānissāma. Dassetha tehi no iddhiṃti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi. Ito
anya-e1101n:1176_3: kira sattāhaccayena imesaṃ dvinnaṃ satthārānaṃ pāṭihāriyāni bhavissanti. Sabbe sannipatantūti
anya-e1101n:1176_4: taṃ sutvā nānādisāsu bahū manussā samāgamiṃsu, atha micchādiṭṭhikā ajja amhākaṃ devassa
anya-e1101n:1176_5: ānubhāvaṃ passāmāti mahantaṃ pūjaṃ karonto tattha sāraṃ nāddasaṃsu, sammādiṭṭhikāpi
anya-e1101n:1176_6: ajja amhākaṃ bhagavato ānubhāvaṃ passissāmāti vāḷukāthūpaṃ gantvā gandhamālādīhi
anya-e1101n:1176_7: pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā añjalimpaggayha aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha rājāpi balavāhanaparivuto
anya-e1101n:1176_8: ekamante aṭṭhāsi. Nānāsamayavādinopi ajja tesaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ passissāmāti mañcātimañcaṃ
anya-e1101n:1176_9: katvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tesaṃ samāgame sammādiṭṭhikā vāḷukāthūpa mabhimukhaṃ katvā añjalimpaggayha
anya-e1101n:1176_10: sāmi amhākaṃ bhagavā sabbabuddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbāṇadhātuyā
anya-e1101n:1176_12: amhākaṃ aññaṃ paṭisaraṇanti vatvā saccakiriyaṃ karontā āhaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1178: Āpāṇakoṭiṃ buddhassa, saraṇaṃ no gatā yadi;
anya-e1101n:1179: Tena saccena yaṃ dhātu, dassetu pāṭihāriyaṃ.

anya-e1101n:1211_0: Evañca pana vatvā upāsakā amhākaṃ anukammaṃ paṭicca mahājanassa micchādiṭṭhibhedanattaṃ
anya-e1101n:1211_1: pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetha sāmīti ārādhesuṃ. Atha buddhānubhāvañca therānubhāvañca upāsakānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1211_2: saccakiriyānubhāvañca paṭicca vāḷukāthūpaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pādapīṭhadhātu ākāsa
anya-e1101n:1211_3: mabbhuggantvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjentī vilāsamānā aṭṭhāsi. Atha mahājanā celukkhepasahassāni
anya-e1101n:1211_4: pavattentā sādhukīḷhaṃ kīḷantā mahānādaṃ pavattentā mahantaṃ pūjamakaṃsu. Micchādiṭṭhikāpi
anya-e1101n:1211_5: imaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā vimhitamānasā micchādiṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā ratanattayaparāyaṇā saraṇa magamaṃsūti.
anya-e1101n:1219_0: So kira purimabuddhesu purimabuddhe itisabbattha katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave
anya-e1101n:1219_1: vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā himavati
anya-e1101n:1219_2: paṭivasati. Tadā sumedho nāma sammāsambuddho viveka manubrūhanto himavantaṃ gantvā
anya-e1101n:1219_3: ramaṇīye padese pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Tadā vijjādharo ākāsena gacchanto chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi
anya-e1101n:1219_4: virājamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā tīhi kaṇikārapupphehi pūjesi, pupphāni buddhānubhāvena
anya-e1101n:1219_5: satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṃsu, so tena bhīyyoso mattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge
anya-e1101n:1219_6: kālaṃkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā uḷāraṃ dibbasampattimanubhavanto yāvatāyukaṃ
anya-e1101n:1219_7: tattha ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare
anya-e1101n:1219_8: brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Uttarotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So uttamarūpadharo
anya-e1101n:1219_9: viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ patvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya sīlācārena
anya-e1101n:1219_10: ca lokassa mahanīyo jāto, tassa taṃ paññāsampattiṃdisvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto
anya-e1101n:1219_11: attano dhītaraṃ dātukāmo hutvā attano adhippāyaṃ pavedesi. So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
anya-e1101n:1219_12: taṃ paṭikkhipitvā kālenakālaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1219_13: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattasampanno hutvā theraṃ upaṭṭhahati. Tena ca
anya-e1101n:1219_14: samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno hoti, tassa bhesajjatthāya uttarasāmaṇero
anya-e1101n:1219_15: pātova pattacīvara mādāya vihārato nikkhamma antarāmagge taḷākassa tīre pattaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e1101n:1219_16: udakasamīpaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ dhovati, tadā aññataro ummaggacoro katakammo ārakkhapurisehi
anya-e1101n:1219_17: anubaddho aggadvāreneva nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto attanā gahitaṃ ratanabhaṇḍikaṃ
anya-e1101n:1219_18: sāmaṇerassa patte pakkhipitvā palāyi. So sāmaṇeropi pattasamīpaṃ sattusamīpaṃ itipi
anya-e1101n:1219_19: katthaci upagato hoti, coraṃ anubandhantā rājapurisā sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṃ
anya-e1101n:1219_20: disvā ayaṃ coro, iminā coriyaṃ katanti sāmaṇeraṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vassakārassa
anya-e1101n:1219_21: brāhmaṇassa dassesuṃ. Vassakāro ca tadā rañño vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ
anya-e1101n:1219_22: anusāsati. So eso pubbe mama vacanaṃ nādiyi. Suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajīti ca baddhāghātattā
anya-e1101n:1219_23: taṃ kammaṃ asodhetvāva jīvantamevetaṃ sūle uttāsethāti āṇā pesi, rājapurisā taṃ nimbasūle
anya-e1101n:1219_24: uttāsesuṃ. Sāmaṇero sūlagge nisinno upajjhāyassa me ko bhesajjaṃ āharissatīti sāriputtattheraṃ
anya-e1101n:1219_25: sari. Tato thero taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā sammāsambuddhassa kathesi, bhagavāpi mahāsāvakaparivuto
anya-e1101n:1219_26: tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā taṃ ṭhānamagamāsi. Tato bhagavato nikkhantabhāvā sakalanagare
anya-e1101n:1219_27: kolāhalaṃ ahosi, mahājanakāyo sannipati. Atha bhagavā vipphurantahatthatale nakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnapītābhāsatāya
anya-e1101n:1219_29: uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā uttara idaṃ te pubbe katapāpakammassa phalaṃ uppannaṃ, tattha
anya-e1101n:1219_30: tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbāti āha. Teneva āha.
anya-e1101n:1221: Atīte kira ekasmiṃ, gāme tva masi dārako;
anya-e1101n:1224: Gahetvā sukhumaṃ sūkaṃ, tadā tvaṃ nimbajalliyā;
anya-e1101n:1227: Aparampi te pāpakammaṃ, pavakkhāmi suṇohi me;
anya-e1101n:1234: Ayaṃ te carimā jāti, etthāpica vipacci soti.
anya-e1101n:1235_0: Evamādinā nayena tassa ajjhāsayānurūpena dhammaṃ desesi, uttaro amatābhisekasadisena
anya-e1101n:1235_2: yathāparicitaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ samārūḷho ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu desanāvilāsena
anya-e1101n:1235_3: maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Dhammaṃ sutvā tattha samāgatānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1235_4: devamanussānaṃ caturāsītipāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti vadanti. Uttaro pana
anya-e1101n:1235_5: chaḷabhiñño hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Mahājanā acchariyabbhutacittā
anya-e1101n:1235_6: jātā ahesuṃ. Tāvadevassa vaṇorundhi, so bhikkhūhi āvuso tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanto
anya-e1101n:1235_7: kathaṃ tvaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjituṃ sakkhīti puṭṭho pageva me āvuso saṃsāre ādīnavo
anya-e1101n:1235_8: saṅkhārānañca sabhāvo sudiṭṭho. Tasmāhaṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantopi asakkhiṃ vipassanaṃ
anya-e1101n:1235_9: vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ adhigantuṃti āha. Athāparabhāge so bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe attano pubbacaritā
anya-e1101n:1244: Tisūlaṃ sukataṃ gayha, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e1101n:1255: Buddhassa ānubhāvena, tīṇi pupphāni me tadā;
anya-e1101n:1261: Tattha me sukataṃ byamhaṃ, kaṇikārīti ñāyati;
anya-e1101n:1282: Tattha naccehi gītehi, tālehi vāditehi ca;
anya-e1101n:1285: Tattha bhutvā ca pitvā ca, modāmi tidase tadā;
anya-e1101n:1293: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyi daṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1295: Dve me bhave saṃsarāmi, devatte atha mānuse;
anya-e1101n:1296: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1298: Dve me kule pajānāmi, khattiye cāpi brāhmaṇe;
anya-e1101n:1299: Nīce kule na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1305: Labhāmi sabba meve taṃ, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1313: Imaṃ khāda imaṃ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
anya-e1101n:1316: Sabbattha pūjito homi, yaso accuggato mama;
anya-e1101n:1320: Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
anya-e1101n:1321: Atho cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, hadaye me na vijjati.
anya-e1101n:1344: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
anya-e1101n:1347: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, buddhaseṭṭhassa santikaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1348: Tisso vijjā anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1350: Paṭisambhidā catasso ca, vimekkhā pica aṭṭhime;
anya-e1101n:1360_0: Jambudīpe kira coḷaraṭṭhe kāvīrapaṭṭanaṃ nāma ahosi. Tattha māhissarikā bahū micchādiṭṭhikā
anya-e1101n:1360_1: vasanti. Tatthekasmiṃ devālaye cittakammaṃ karontā ekasmiṃ phalake issarassa onamitvā
anya-e1101n:1360_2: vandanākāraṃ bhagavato rūpaṃ akaṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye tattha bahū upāsakā taṃ devakulaṃ
anya-e1101n:1360_3: gantvā tattha tattha cittakammāni olokentā tasmiṃ phalake taṃ cittakammaṃ addasaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1360_4: Disvāna te aho amhehi apassitabbaṃ passitaṃ. Sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyāsadevamanussāya
anya-e1101n:1360_5: pajāya ca aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu bhagavato uttaritaraṃ ṭhapetvā samasamopi natthi.
anya-e1101n:1360_6: Sakalehi sattanikāyehi vandanīyo pūjanīyo bhagavā. Ananurūpaṃ tassa etehi kataṃti
anya-e1101n:1360_7: rodantā paridevantā rājadvāraṃ gantvā ugghosesuṃ, taṃ sutvā rājā te pakkosāpetvā
anya-e1101n:1360_8: kasmā tumhe ugghosethāti pucchi, te eva māhaṃsu. Deva amhākaṃ bhagavā devātidevo
anya-e1101n:1360_9: sakkātisakko brahmātibrahmā meruva acalo sāgaro gambhīro ākāsova ananto pathavīva
anya-e1101n:1360_10: patthaṭotiādīhi bhagavato guṇaṃ vaṇṇesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne.
anya-e1101n:1392: Satthā no bhagavā deva, mahābrahmehi vandito;
anya-e1101n:1395: Sabbesu cakkavāḷesu, ye aggā ye ca pūjitā;
anya-e1101n:1397_0: Ayuttaṃ deva devakulehi kataṃti āhaṃsu. Taṃ sutvā rājā bho sabbepi manussā attano
anya-e1101n:1397_1: attano devatānaṃ mahantabhāvaṃ kathenti. Tumhākaṃ pana satthuno mahantabhāvaṃ kathaṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_2: amhākaṃ jānāpethāti, upāsakā na garu tvaṃ mahārāja phalakaṃ āharāpetvā suddhavatthena
anya-e1101n:1397_3: veṭhetvā taṃ attano muddikāya lañchitvā surakkhitasugopite ekasmiṃ devakule ṭhapetvā
anya-e1101n:1397_4: sattāhaccayena āharāpetvā taṃ oloketha, tadā no satthuno mahantānubhāvaṃ jānāthāti
anya-e1101n:1397_5: āhaṃsu, atha rājā tesaṃ vuttaniyāmeneva kārāpetvā antodevakule ṭhapetvā sabbadvārāni
anya-e1101n:1397_6: pidahitvā lañchetvā rakkheyyāthāti niyojesi. Tato te upāsakā sabbe sannipatitvā sattāhaṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_7: dānaṃ dentā sīlaṃ rakkhantā uposathakammaṃ karontā sabbasattesu mettiṃ bhāventā sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_8: attanā katapuññesu pattiṃ dentā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ pūjaṃ karontā evaṃ ugghosesuṃ. Amhākaṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_9: katakusalanissandena loke mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā sabbe devā ca lokaṃ pālentā cattāro
anya-e1101n:1397_10: mahārājāno ca amhākaṃ satthuno upaṭṭhānāya upaṭṭhāya itisabbattha ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassentūti
anya-e1101n:1397_11: saccakiriyaṃ akaṃsu. Atha tesaṃ puññānubhāvena tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_12: uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Tato so manussalokaṃ olokento micchādiṭṭhīhi kataṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_13: disvā saṃviggo āgantvā issaraṃ bhagavato pāde vanditvā sayitākāraṃ katvā taṃ pavattiṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_14: upāsakānaṃ kathetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Tato sattame divasepātova te sabbepi
anya-e1101n:1397_15: rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā evamāhaṃsu. Deva issaro amhākaṃ bhagavato pāde sirasā
anya-e1101n:1397_16: vanditvā nipannoti. Atha rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājane
anya-e1101n:1397_17: sannipātetvā tehi parivuto devakulaṃ gantvā lañchaṃ bhindāpetvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā
anya-e1101n:1397_18: phalakaṃ āharāpetvā veṭhitasāṭake mocāpesi. Atha rājā ca mahājano ca taṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e1101n:1397_19: pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ pahāya sabbe satthuno saraṇa magamaṃsu. Atha rājā
anya-e1101n:1397_20: taṃ devakulaṃ bhindāpetvā mahantaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññakammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye amhākaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ upanissāya jetavane viharati dhammadesanāya
anya-e1101n:1405_1: mahājanassa saggamokkhasampadaṃ dadamāno. Tasmiṃsamaye pañcasatā corā aṭavito nagaraṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_2: āgantvā rattibhāge corakammaṃ katvā tena puttadāre posenti. Athekadivasaṃ corā corakammatthāya
anya-e1101n:1405_3: nagaraṃ pavisantā nagaradvāre ekaṃ dukkhitaṃ janapadamanussaṃ passitvā hambho kattha
anya-e1101n:1405_4: vasatīti pucchiṃsu, so attajanā janapadavāsibhāvaṃ pakāsesi. Athassa te kasmā bho
anya-e1101n:1405_5: iminā dukkhavāsena vasissasi, ehi amhehi saddhiṃ corakammaṃ karonto vatthālaṅkārasampanno
anya-e1101n:1405_6: puttadāraṃ posehi. Iminā kapaṇavāsena na vasāti āhaṃsu. So panime yuttaṃ kathentīti
anya-e1101n:1405_7: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi. Atha te evaṃ sati amhehi saddhiṃ āgacchāhīti vatvā naṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_8: gahetvā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhā tattha tattha vilumpantā corakammaṃ akaṃsu. Tadā jānapadiko
anya-e1101n:1405_9: laddhavibhavo imameva varataranti tehi saddhiṃ corakammaṃ karonto jīvikaṃ kappesi,
anya-e1101n:1405_10: athekadivasaṃ rājapurisā katakamme te sabbeva gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā
anya-e1101n:1405_11: kosalarañño dassesuṃ, rājā te disvā evamāha, bhaṇe tumhākaṃ antare yo etesaṃ māretvā
anya-e1101n:1405_12: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati, tassa jīvitadānaṃ dammīti, taṃ sutvā te corā sabbe aññamaññañātisuhadasambandhabhāvena
anya-e1101n:1405_13: taṃ na icchiṃsu. So pana janapadavāsī manusso ahamete sabbe māressāmīti rañño vatvā
anya-e1101n:1405_14: tenānuññāto te sabbe māresi. Taṃ disvā tuṭṭho rājā tassa coraghātakammaṃ adāsi. So
anya-e1101n:1405_15: core ca vajjhappatte ca mārento pañcavīsativassāni vasanto aparabhāge mahallako ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1405_16: Atha so mandabalattā katipayapahārenāpi coraṃ māretuṃ na sakkoti, rājā taṃ ñatvā
anya-e1101n:1405_17: aññassa coraghātakammaṃ adāsi. Atha so coraghātakammā coraghātakamma itipikatthaci
anya-e1101n:1405_18: parihīno attano gehe vasati. Tadā aññataro manusso mantaṃ parivattetvā nāsāvātena
anya-e1101n:1405_19: manussamāraṇakamantaṃ jānāti. Tathāhi hatthapādakaṇṇanāsasīsādīsu yaṃkiñci chejjabhejjaṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_20: kattukāmo mantaṃ parivattetvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjeti. Taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ chijjati bhijjati,
anya-e1101n:1405_21: evaṃ mahānubhāvo so manto, atha so taṃ purisaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā mantaṃ labhitvā rañño
anya-e1101n:1405_22: sāsanaṃ pesesi. Ahaṃ ito pubbe mahallakattā corānaṃ hatthapādādayo dukkhena chejja
anya-e1101n:1405_23: bhejjaṃ karomi, māretabbepi dukkhena māremi. Idāni panāhaṃ tathā na karomi, mama
anya-e1101n:1405_24: mantānubhāvena chejjabhejjakammaṃ karissāmīti. Rājā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā sādhūti taṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_25: pakkosāpetvā ṭhānantaraṃ tasseva pākatika makāsi. So tato paṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ karonto
anya-e1101n:1405_26: puna pañcavassāni atikkāmesi. So mahallako khīṇāyuko dubbalo maraṇamañcaparāyaṇo
anya-e1101n:1405_27: hutvā maraṇavedanādukkhena mahantena bhayānakena saddena vissaraṃ viravanto nimīlitena
anya-e1101n:1405_29: nipanno hoti, tato tassa paṭivissakagehe manussā tassa bhayānakasaddasavaṇena gehaṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_30: chaṭṭetvā palāyiṃsu. Tasmiṃ kira divase mahāsāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokentā
anya-e1101n:1405_31: taṃ coraghātakaṃ tadaheva kālaṃkatvā niraye nibbattamānaṃ disvā mayi tattha gate
anya-e1101n:1405_32: panesa mayi pasādena sagge nibbattatīti ñatvā ajja mayā tassānuggahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
anya-e1101n:1405_33: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā tassa gharadvāra magamāsi. Atha so theraṃ disvā kuddho
anya-e1101n:1405_34: kopena taṭataṭāyamānadeho ajja taṃ vijjhitvā phāletvā māressāmīti nipannova mantaṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_35: parivattetvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjesi, thero tasmiṃ khaṇe nirodhasamāpanno nirodhā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1101n:1405_36: suriyo viya virocamāno aṭṭhāsi, atha so therassa tayo vāre tatheva katvā kiñci kātuṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_37: asakkonto ativiya vimhitacitto there cittaṃ pasādetvā attano paṭiyattaṃ pāyasaṃ therassa
anya-e1101n:1405_38: dāpesi, thero maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vihārameva agamāsi, coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_39: anussaranto tasmiṃ khaṇe kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbatti. Aho vītarāgānaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1405_40: ānubhāvo. Evaṃ narake nibbattamānopissa balena sagge nibbattoti. Tathāhi.
anya-e1101n:1408: Dānaṃ saggassa sopānaṃ, dānaṃ santikaraṃ paraṃ.
anya-e1101n:1416: Pāpakammesu nirato, ṭhitoyaṃ narakāyane narakāvane itipikatthaci;
anya-e1101n:1422: Tasmā sukhette saddhāya, detha dānāni kāmadaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1423: Dānaṃ dentehi sīlampi, pālanīyaṃtisundaranti pālanaṃcātisundaraṃ itipikatthaci.
anya-e1101n:1424_0: Atha bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā nisinnā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu, kiṃbhante
anya-e1101n:1424_1: so pāpo catūsu apāyesu katarasmiṃ nibbattoti. Atha satthā ajjesa bhikkhave sāriputtassa
anya-e1101n:1424_2: dinnadānānubhāvena devaloke nibbatto, tasseva nissandena anāgate paccekabuddho bhavissatīti byākāsīti.
anya-e1101n:1432_0: Atīte kira kassapadasabalassa kāle eko puriso saddho ratanattayesu pasanno ucchuyantakammena
anya-e1101n:1432_1: jīvikaṃ kappento paṭivasati. Atha so ekaṃ gilānabhikkhuṃ disvā tassa uḷuṅkamattaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_2: sappiṃ adāsi, tathevekassa bhikkhussa ekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ adāsi, athāparasmiṃdivase ekaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_3: chātajjhattaṃ sunakhaṃ disvā tassa bhattapiṇḍena saṅgaha makāsi, athekassa iṇaṭṭhakassa
anya-e1101n:1432_4: ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ adāsi, athekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ suṇamāno dhammadesakassa bhikkhussa sāṭakaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_5: pūjesi, so ettakaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā bhavesu caramānohaṃ samuddapabbatādīsupi yaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_6: yaṃ icchāmi. Taṃ taṃ samijjhatūti patthanaṃ akāsi, so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā teheva
anya-e1101n:1432_7: kusalamūlehi suttappabuddho viya devaloke nibbattitvā tattha mahantaṃ dibbasampattiṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_8: anubhavitvā tato cuto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ mahaddhane mahāsālakule
anya-e1101n:1432_9: nibbattitvā tato so viññutaṃ patto kālena kālaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_10: pabbajjāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ sutvā pabbajito na cireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So aparabhāge
anya-e1101n:1432_11: satthāraṃ vanditvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro ugganagaraṃ agamāsi, tattha seṭṭhino
anya-e1101n:1432_12: bhariyā saddhā ahosi pasannā. Sā theraṃ pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhikkhāya carantaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_13: disvā turitaturitā gantvā therassa pattaṃ gahetvā saddhiṃ pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi bhojetvā
anya-e1101n:1432_14: theraṃ tattha nibaddhavāsatthaṃ yācitvā pañcasatakūṭāgārāni kārāpetvā alaṅkaritvā
anya-e1101n:1432_15: pañcasatabhikkhū tattha vāsentī nibaddhaṃ catupaccayehi upaṭṭhānamakāsi. Tato thero
anya-e1101n:1432_16: taṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tattha yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā aññatta gantukāmo
anya-e1101n:1432_17: anupubbena paṭṭanagāmaṃ agamāsi, tattha vasitvā tato nāvaṃ abhiruyha pañcasatabhikkhūhi
anya-e1101n:1432_18: parivuto samuddapiṭṭhena gacchati, samuddaṃ tarantassa tassa sāgaramajjhe udaravāto
anya-e1101n:1432_19: samuṭṭhahitvā pīḷeti, taṃ disvā bhikkhū bhante idaṃ pubbe kena vūpasamessatīti pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1432_20: thero pubbe me āvuso uluṅkamatte sappipīte rogo vūpasammatīti āha, bhikkhū bhante
anya-e1101n:1432_21: samuddapiṭṭhe kathaṃ sappiṃ labhissāma, adhivāsethāti āhaṃsu, taṃ sutvā therena theronanoāyasmantā
anya-e1101n:1432_22: itisabbattha na no āyasmantā sappi dullabhā, mama pattaṃ gahetvā samuddodakaṃ uddharitvā
anya-e1101n:1432_23: ānethāti vutte bhikkhū tathā akaṃsu. Uddhaṭamattameva taṃudakaṃ parivattetvā sappi
anya-e1101n:1432_24: ahosi, atha bhikkhū taṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittā jātā therassa sappiṃ upanāmesuṃ,
anya-e1101n:1432_25: therena sappino sappinā itisabbattha pītamatte so ābādho vūpasami, athassa bhikkhūhi
anya-e1101n:1432_26: ki metaṃ bhante acchariyaṃ, na no ito pubbe evarūpaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃti vutte thero tenahi
anya-e1101n:1432_27: katapuññānaṃ puññavipākaṃ passissathāti vatvā samuddaṃ olokesi idaṃ sappi hotūti.
anya-e1101n:1432_28: Athassa cakkhupathe samudde sabbodakaṃ parivattetvā sappi ahosi. Athassa bhikkhū
anya-e1101n:1432_29: abbhutacittā aññampi īdisaṃ puññaṃ atthi bhanteti pucchiṃsu, tato thero tenahi passathāyasmantā
anya-e1101n:1432_30: mama puññanti vatvā samantā tattha tattha ghanaselapabbate olokesi, sabbāni tāni
anya-e1101n:1432_31: guḷapiṇḍāni ahesuṃ, tato cakkhupathe samantā bhattabhājanāni dassesi sabyañjanaṃ
anya-e1101n:1432_32: sopakaraṇaṃ. Tato himavantaṃ olokesi, sabbaṃ taṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ ahosi. Athābhimukhaṭṭhāne
anya-e1101n:1432_33: mahantaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ olokesi, sakalavanasaṇḍaṃnānāvirāgavatthehi sañchannaṃ ahosi,
anya-e1101n:1432_34: bhikkhū taṃ taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā atīva vimhitā bhante kena te puññakammena etādisāni
anya-e1101n:1432_35: pāṭihāriyāni bhavissantīti pucchiṃsu, thero kassapadasabalassa kāle attanā kataṃ
anya-e1101n:1434: Imasmiṃ bhaddake kappe, kassapo nāma nāyako;
anya-e1101n:1450: Taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ ghataṃ hoti, ghatadānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1456: Tena so sukhito āsi, rogaṃ byapagataṃ tadā.
anya-e1101n:1459: Yatthatthosmi guḷenāhaṃ, tattha taṃ sulabhaṃ mama.
anya-e1101n:1464: Athāpi me kataṃ puññaṃ, suṇātha sādhu bhikkhavo;
anya-e1101n:1481: Hoti hemamayaṃ sabbaṃ, iṇato mocane phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1483: Aññampi mama puññaṃ bho, suṇātha sutisobhanaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1490: Labhāmi pacuraṃ vatthaṃ, yaṃ lokasmiṃ varaṃ paraṃ.
anya-e1101n:1492: Icchamāno sace ajja jānamānopahaṃajja; jānadhānocahaṃajja itikatthaci, himavantampi pabbataṃ;
anya-e1101n:1511: Athassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū ca mahājano ca dānādikusalakammaṃ katvā yebhuyyena saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃti.
anya-e1101n:1519_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavati parinibbute bārāṇasīnagaravāsī eko duggatapuriso paragehe bhatiṃkatvā
anya-e1101n:1519_1: jīvikaṃ kappeti, tasmiṃ samaye nagaravāsino yebhuyyena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne maṇḍapādayo
anya-e1101n:1519_2: kārāpetvā mahādānaṃ denti, taṃ disvā duggato evaṃ cintesi, ahaṃ pubbe akatapuññattā
anya-e1101n:1519_3: paragehe bhatiṃ katvā kicchena kasirena jīvāmi. Nivāsanapārupanampi vāsaṭṭhānamattammi
anya-e1101n:1519_4: dukkhato labhāmi. Idāni buddhuppādo vattati bhikkhusaṅghopi.
anya-e1101n:1520_0: Sabbe ime dānaṃ datvā saggamaggaṃ sodhenti. Mayāpi dānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tamme dīgharattaṃ
anya-e1101n:1520_1: hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. Api ca mayhaṃ taṇḍulanālimattampi natthi, akatavīriyena
anya-e1101n:1520_2: taṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkā, etadatthāyāhaṃ uyyogaṃ katvā dānaṃ dassāmīti cintetvā
anya-e1101n:1520_3: tato paṭṭhāya bhatiṃ pariyesamāno gantvā tattha tattha bhatiṃ katvā laddhanivāpe
anya-e1101n:1520_4: ca bhikkhācariyāya laddhatilataṇḍulādayo ca ekattha saṃharitvā manusse samādāpetvā
anya-e1101n:1520_5: tasmiṃ maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā vanakusamādīhi taṃ alaṅkaritvā bhikkhū nimantetvā maṇḍape
anya-e1101n:1520_6: nisīdāpetvā sabbesaṃ pāyasaṃ pāyāsaṃ itisabbattha paṭiyādetvā bhojesi. Atha so maraṇakāle
anya-e1101n:1520_7: attanā kataṃ taṃ dānavaraṃ anussari. So tena kusalakammena suttappabuddho viya devaloke
anya-e1101n:1520_8: nibbatti. Tasmiṃ tena katapuññānurūpaṃ mahantaṃ kanakavimānaṃ nibbatti. Samantā tigāvutaṭṭhāne

anya-e1101n:1581_0: Ito pubbe nāradassa kira sammāsambuddhassa kāle ayaṃ dīpo aññatarena nāmena pākaṭo
anya-e1101n:1581_1: ahosi, so panekasmiṃ kāle dubbhikkho ahosi dussasso, mahāchātakabhayaṃ satte pīḷeti.
anya-e1101n:1581_2: Tasmiṃ samaye nāradassa bhagavato eko sāsaniko sāvako aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā
anya-e1101n:1581_3: yathā dhotapattova nikkhami. Athaññatarasmiṃ gehe manussā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃpoṭalikāya
anya-e1101n:1581_4: bandhitvā udake pakkhipitvā pacitvā udakaṃ gahetvā pivanto jīvanti, tadā theraṃ disvā
anya-e1101n:1581_5: vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā tena taṇḍulena bhattaṃ pacitvā patte pakkhipitvā therassa
anya-e1101n:1581_6: adaṃsu. Atha tesaṃ saddhābalena sā ukkhali bhattena paripuṇṇā ahosi, te taṃ abbhutaṃ
anya-e1101n:1581_7: disvā ayyassa dinnadāne vipāko ajjeva no diṭṭhoti somanassajātā mahājanaṃ sannipātetvā
anya-e1101n:1581_8: te bhattaṃ bhojetvā pacchā sayaṃ bhuñjiṃsu. Bhattassa gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ pūrateva.
anya-e1101n:1581_9: Tato paṭṭhāya te sampattamahājanassa dānaṃ dadantā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbattiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1581_10: atha so thero bhattaṃ ādāya gantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīditvā bhuñjitumārati.
anya-e1101n:1581_11: Tasmiṃ kira rukkhe nibbatto eko devaputto āhārena kilanto bhuñjamānaṃ theraṃ disvā
anya-e1101n:1581_12: attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahallakavesena tassa samīpe aṭṭhāsi. Thero anāvajjitvāva bhuñjati.
anya-e1101n:1581_13: Devaputto carimālopaṃ ṭhapetvā bhuttakāle ukkāsitvā attānaṃ ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānāpesi.
anya-e1101n:1581_14: Thero taṃ disvā vippaṭisāri hutvā carimaṃ bhatthapiṇḍaṃ tassa hatthe ṭhapesi, tato
anya-e1101n:1581_15: so bhattapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā ṭhito cintesi. Ito kira mayā pubbe samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vā kapaṇaddhikānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1581_16: vā antamaso kākasunakhā dīnampi āhāraṃ adinnapubbaṃ bhavissati, tenavāhaṃ devo hutvāpi
anya-e1101n:1581_17: bhattaṃ na labhāmi. Handāhaṃ imaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ therasseva dassāmi, taṃ me bhavissati
anya-e1101n:1581_18: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya cāti. Evañca pana cintetvā bhattapiṇḍe āsaṃ pahāya theraṃ
anya-e1101n:1581_19: upasaṅkamma sāmi dāsassa vo alaṃ idha lokena saṅgahaṃ. Paralokena me saṅgahaṃ karothāti
anya-e1101n:1581_20: vatvā tassa patte okiri. Athassa bhatthapiṇḍaṃ bhatthapiṇḍaṃ itisabbattha patte patitamatteyeva
anya-e1101n:1581_21: tigāvutaṭṭhāne dibbamayāni bhattabhājanānipaññāyiṃsu. Devaputto theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
anya-e1101n:1581_22: vanditvā tato dibbabhojanaṃ gahetvā pathamaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchā sayaṃ bhuñci. Tato
anya-e1101n:1581_23: deputto dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya therassa ca sampattamahājanassa ca mahādānaṃ dento
anya-e1101n:1581_24: āyupariyosāne 0 devaloke nibbattitvā chasu kāmasaggesu aparāparaṃ dibbasampatti manubhavamāno
anya-e1101n:1581_25: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tato cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ anekavibhavassa micchādiṭṭhikassa
anya-e1101n:1581_26: kuṭumbikassa gehe nibbatti. Devotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Aparabhāge viññutaṃ pattassa
anya-e1101n:1581_27: tassa mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Sovaṇṇamaṇimuttādipūritakoṭṭhāgārādayo oloketvā mama
anya-e1101n:1581_28: mātāpitaro micchādiṭṭhikattā ito dānādikiñcikammaṃ akaritvā paralokaṃ gacchantā kākaṇikamattampi
anya-e1101n:1581_29: agahetvā gatā, ahaṃ pana taṃ gahetvāva gamissāmīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā bheriṃ carāpetvā
anya-e1101n:1581_30: kapaṇaddhikavanibbake sannipātetvā sattāhabbhantare sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dānamukhena
anya-e1101n:1581_31: datvā araññaṃ pavisitvā isippabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañca bhiññā
anya-e1101n:1581_32: aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā ākāsacārī ahosi. Atha tasmiṃsamaye padumuttaro nāma
anya-e1101n:1581_33: bhagavā haṃsavatīnagare paṭivasanto devabrahmādiparivuto catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1581_34: desento nisinno hoti, tadā so tāpaso ākāsena gacchanto mahājanasamāgamañca bhagavato
anya-e1101n:1581_35: sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca disvā kimetaṃti vimhito ākāsā otaritvā mahatiyā
anya-e1101n:1581_36: buddhalīḷāya nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso parisantare
anya-e1101n:1581_37: nisinno dhammaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano assamameva agamāsi. Atha so tattha
anya-e1101n:1581_38: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto tiṃsakappe dibbasampattimanubhavanto
anya-e1101n:1581_39: chasu kāmasaggesu aparāpariyavasena saṃsari. Ekapaññāsaattabhāve sakko devarājā ahosi,
anya-e1101n:1581_40: ekakavīsatiattabhāve cakkavatti hutvā manussasampatti manubhavitvā imasmiṃbuddhuppāde
anya-e1101n:1581_41: bhagavati parinibbute sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā sattavassiko
anya-e1101n:1581_42: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ addasa. Disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā aniccasaññaṃ
anya-e1101n:1581_43: paṭilabhitvā tattha nisinnova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, tato so pattapaṭisambhido attanā
anya-e1101n:1581_44: katapuññakammaṃ olokento taṃ pubbacariyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe pakāsento āha. Tasmā.
anya-e1101n:1583: Nārado kira sambuddho, pubbe āsi naruttamo;

anya-e1101n:1620: So taṃ disvāna nabhasā, ṭhitohaṃ parisantare.
anya-e1101n:1622: Dhammaṃ sutvā udaggohaṃ, kālaṃ katvāna satthuno;
anya-e1101n:1632: Imasmiṃ bhaddake kappe, nibbutetu nibbutesu itisabbattha tathāgate.
anya-e1101n:1640: Sudinnaṃ me tadā dānaṃ, sussutaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ;

anya-e1101n:1650_0: Ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā loke udapādi dhammadesanāya
anya-e1101n:1650_1: satte amatamahānibbāṇaṃ pāpento, tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā haṃsāvatiyaṃ sarājikāya parisāya
anya-e1101n:1650_2: majjhe ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tadā rājā taṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_3: kāmayamāno buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle sirasā nipajji,
anya-e1101n:1650_4: tadāssa bhagavā anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane taṃ ṭhānaṃ labhissasīti vatvā
anya-e1101n:1650_5: byākāsi. Taṃ sutvā mudito rājā puññāni katvā devaloke nibbatti. Tato aparabhāge bārāṇasiyaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_6: seṭṭhiputto hutvā paccekabuddhasahassaṃ catupaccayadānena yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggitvā
anya-e1101n:1650_7: devaloke nibbatto mahantaṃ sampatti manubhavitvā tato cuto vipassissa bhagavato kāle
anya-e1101n:1650_8: bandhumatīnagare aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatti. So tasmiṃ samaye senaguttaṭṭhāne
anya-e1101n:1650_9: ṭhatvā rañño kammaṃ karoti, tadā nagaravāsino upāsakagaṇā vipassīsammāsambuddhaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_10: upasaṅkamma vanditvā bhagavā bhante sasāvako amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ karotūti svātanāya
anya-e1101n:1650_11: nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā sabbe ekacchandā bhagavanta muddissa mahārahaṃ mahāpariveṇaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_12: kārāpetvā pariveṇamahe mahādānaṃ dadantā dānagge asukaṃ nāma natthīti na vattabbanti
anya-e1101n:1650_13: vatvā dānaṃ paṭiyādetvā dānaggaṃ olokentā navadadhiñca paṭalamadhuñca apassantā purise
anya-e1101n:1650_14: pakkositvā sahassaṃ datvā dadhimadhuṃ khippaṃ pariyesitvā ānethāti pesesuṃ, te sahassaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_15: gahetvā dadhimadhuṃ upadhāretuṃ tattha tattha vicarantā dvārantare aṭṭhaṃsu, tadā
anya-e1101n:1650_16: ayaṃ senagutto rañño sabhattaṃ dadhimadhuṃ ādāya gacchanto mahādvāraṃ sampāpuṇi,
anya-e1101n:1650_17: atha te dadhimadhuṃ disvā bho kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā imaṃ dehīti yāciṃsu. Tena tenadassāmi
anya-e1101n:1650_18: itipikattaci na dassāmīti vutte yāvasahassaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāciṃsu. Tato senagutto imaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_19: appagghaṃ sahassena yācatha, ki manena karothāti pucchi, tehi sambuddhatthāyāti vutte
anya-e1101n:1650_20: tenahi ahameva dassāmīti jīramaricādīhi sakkharamadhuphāṇitādayo yojetvā dānaggaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_21: upanāmesi. Taṃ satthu ānubhāvena buddhapamukhassa aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa
anya-e1101n:1650_22: pahoṇakaṃ ahosi. Tato so tena puññakammena devamanussalokesu sampatti manubhavitvā
anya-e1101n:1650_23: aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle koliyanagare mahālilicchavirañño upanissāya suppiyāya
anya-e1101n:1650_24: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. So sattamāsasattasaṃvaccharāni mātukucchiyaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_25: vasitvā sattadivasāni mūḷhagabbho dukkhamanubhavi. Mātukucchito nikkhamantassa tassa
anya-e1101n:1650_26: mātāpitaro sīvalīti nāma makaṃsu. Evaṃ mahāpuññassa ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātukucchimhi dukkhānubhavanaṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_27: attanāva katena pāpabalena ahosi, so kira atīte rājā hutvā attano sapattaraññā saddhiṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_28: saṅgāmento mātarā saddhiṃ mantesi. Sā nagaraṃ rundhitvā amitte gaṇhituṃ sakkāti upāya
anya-e1101n:1650_29: madāsi, sopi tassā vacanena nagaraṃ rundhitvā sattame divase aggahesi, tena pāpakammabalena
anya-e1101n:1650_30: mātāputtānaṃ evaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ahosīti. Tato sā puttaṃ vijāyanakāle sattame divase
anya-e1101n:1650_31: bhagavantaṃ anussaritvā sukhena bhāraṃ muñci. Tuṭṭhā sā sattame divase buddhapamukhassa
anya-e1101n:1650_32: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi, athassā putto sattavassikakāle gehā nikkhamma satthāraṃ
anya-e1101n:1650_33: disvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Satthā sāriputtattherassa niyojesi, tato sāriputtattherena
anya-e1101n:1650_34: upajjhāyena moggallānamācariyaṃ katvā pabbaji, atha so khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā
anya-e1101n:1650_35: buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi, so pubbe katapuññānubhāvena mahāpuñño ahosi lābhīnañca aggo.
anya-e1101n:1650_36: Athekasmiṃ samaye bhagavā revatattheraṃ dassanāya khadiravanavihāraṃ gacchanto tiṃsabhikkhusahassehi
anya-e1101n:1650_37: saddhiṃ tiṃsayojanikaṃ chaṭṭitakantāraṃ sampāpuṇi nirūdakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ. Yebhuyyena

anya-e1101n:1650_39: kārāpite vihāre vasanto devatāhi sajjitadānaṃ paribhuñjanto revatattheraṃ saṃpāpuṇitvā

anya-e1101n:1727: Sahassampi ca datvāna, na latiṃsu ca taṃ dvayaṃ;

anya-e1101n:1730: Yathā ime janā sabbe, sakkaronti tathāgataṃ;
anya-e1101n:1742: Tato sapattino sampattino; sapattāno iticakatthaci ruddhā, ekāhaṃ rakkhitā ahuṃ;

anya-e1101n:1745: Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātohaṃ koliye pure;
anya-e1101n:1746: Suppavāsā ca me mātā, mahāli licchavī pitā.
anya-e1101n:1752: Mātā me chandadānena, eva māsi sudukkhitā.
anya-e1101n:1761: Devo nāgā manussā ca, paccayānu panenti me.

anya-e1101n:1772: Tadā devo panītehi paṇītehi itisabbattha, mamatthāya mahāmati;

anya-e1101n:1781: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
anya-e1101n:1784: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, buddhaseṭṭhassa santikaṃ;

anya-e1101n:1799_0: Bhagavati parinibbute pāṭaliputtanagare mahāseno nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi dhammiko
anya-e1101n:1799_1: dhammarājā. So pana pitupitāmahādīnaṃ dhanarāsiṃ oloketvā ime imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ pahāya
anya-e1101n:1799_2: maccuno mukhamupagatā. Aho saṃsārikānaṃ aññāṇatā. Dhanaṃ ṭhapetvā attano vināsañca
anya-e1101n:1799_3: attānaṃ ṭhapetvā dhanavināsañca na jānantīti sampattiyā adhigamañca vināsaṃ cāti
anya-e1101n:1799_4: sabbaṃ cintetvā dhammañca sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho divase divase dasasahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1101n:1799_5: madhurena annapānena santappento anekāni puññāni upacinanto ekadivasaṃ raho paṭisallino
anya-e1101n:1799_6: evaṃ cintesi. Evaṃ rājaniyogena janassa pīḷanaṃ katvā dinnadānato sahatthena kammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1799_7: katvā laddhena dinnadānaṃ mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ bhavissati, evaṃ mayā kātabbanti
anya-e1101n:1799_8: so suhadā maccassa rajjaṃ nīyyātetvā attano kaṇiṭṭhikaṃ ādāya kiñci ajānāpetvā aññataravesena
anya-e1101n:1799_9: nagarā nikkhamma uttaramadhuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ agamāsi, tattha mahāvibhavo eko seṭṭhi
anya-e1101n:1799_10: paṭivasati, te seṭṭhino samīpa mupagamma ṭhitā. Tena kimatthāyāgatāti vutte rājā
anya-e1101n:1799_11: tava gehe bhatiyā kammaṃ karissāmīti vatvā tenānuññāto tīṇi vassāni kamma makāsi,
anya-e1101n:1799_12: tato ekadivasaṃ seṭṭhi te disvā pakkositvā atīva tumhe sukhumālatarā. Tathāpi imasmiṃ
